sect2.title: Panel Applets

sect3.title: Network Monitor
sect3.para:
The new Network Monitor applet shows whether your connection is active. It can also tell you how many megabytes you have uploaded and downloaded.
Network Monitor
The Network Monitor panel applet.

sect3.title: Keyboard Indicator
sect3.para:
As mentioned in the Control Panel section, the Keyboard Indicator applet shows the current keyboard layout and lets you choose another, without using the keyboard shortcut. TODO: Remove the duplication?
Keyboard Indicator
The Keyboard Indicator panel applet.

sect3.title: Keyboard Accessibility Status
sect3.para:
As mentioned in the accessibility section, the new Keyboard Accessibility Status gives quick access to the Accessibility control panel, and gives visual feedback when using the sticky-keys feature. The sticky-keys feature allows people with limited mobility to press modifier keys, such as shift, in sequence instead of simultaneously. TODO: Remove the duplication?
Keyboard Indicator
The Keyboard Accessibility Status applet, showing that the Shift and Control keys have been pressed.
